TopicTitle: What is the avatar of the person above you saying/thinking?

Articles.Content: The wheels on the bus go round and round! Round and round! Round and round! The wheels on the bus go round and round, all through the town.
Look at that sand dune over there. That looks great for building a secret base.
This stone I found gave me wings.
The next great Pokemon
"Hello, I'm a reference to something!"
"help! This lifesaver-shaped metal object is strangling me!"
Hey what's that I whant to touch it
"Stuck between being Ash and being mario..."
am I wearing headphones?
"Hello Kitty? Mario? Hello Kitty? Mario?..."
Woof!
"such galaxy"
Crystal ears
How bout an 8-bit hug?
I'm a chocolate lab.
"I'm lonely"
Me notch pet

Ah, I've heard about you, Endersmens. You can call me Red, the discreet silencer. You know that [insert name here] is a mythical pokemon. It's hard to catch and raise, but it's power is superior. It's virtually indestructible. There's no being clever with it.

Well, are you ready to lose? You streak ends with me, Endersmens!

Ah, I've heard about you, Endersmens. You can call me Red, the discreet silencer. You know that [insert name here] is a mythical pokemon. It's hard to catch and raise, but it's power is superior. It's virtually indestructible. There's no being clever with it.

Well, are you ready to lose? You streak ends with me, Endersmens!

Ninja'd by Ethanadams!

I am a beautiful pony.

[[it was my intention to be speaking as Red. I do not see any ninja-ing here.]]

Isss gown' be simple, aeiyt? We jus' gown' flah up and u gown' detach and flah tu space. Isss yo first tahm, so don't be 'shamed if ya screwitup!
I sense the Kraken's presence near a ship. Time to warn them.
A happy robot?
"I'm a little red-mouse, short and stout."
Yep. That's the moon. Way up there. Where I can't go because I'm a giant satellite dish.
No no NO! The script! Ah... crap, it's already too late. I might as well put the pieces of the fourth wall to good use later.
